clients.title: Google is Suspending Many GMB Listings
description: Google, after some negative media attention, has recently removed a massive number of virtual offices from Google My Business and Google Maps. In the process, Google suspended a number of listings with real addresses as well. Google is aware of this issue, but stated that it currently has a backlog of 2-3 weeks in addressing reconsideration requests (normally a reconsideration request takes 2 days).

While your listing may not have been suspended, we recommend you do NOT make any changes to your Google My Business listing for at least the next few weeks. Any change on a listing could get it suspended, and it could remain suspended until the Google support backlog subsides. If you need to make an emergency update that you think is absolutely necessary, please contact us first.

At Justia, we build law firm websites that are responsive, mobile-friendly, and AMP enabled. Our commitment to high-quality, relevant websites will help you attract clients in the practice areas and locations most important to your firm. We also offer Premium Membership on the Justia & LII Lawyer directories.

If you're interested in our website and SEO services, Premium membership opportunities, or if you would just like to learn more about what we have to offer, contact one of our marketing specialists today.
